main event: On March 9, 1966, a witness observed a saucer-like object in Brazil, Indiana for about 30 seconds.
interesting points: The object resembled two inverted saucers stacked together,The observer noted the absence of any sound except for the sound of a paper cup,The object vanished quickly, indicating it could not have been a conventional aircraft,The witness estimated the object's speed to be around 10,200 MPH and its distance to be about 2,000 feet away,The witness provided a hand-drawn sketch of the object and described it as white and climbing at a high angle.
witness description: 17-year-old male residing in Brazil, Indiana, who reported a past sighting.
